page.title: 01EDWARD BARNSLEY.
page.content: Edward was born in 1900.He started working at Henry Lupton's workshop as an apprentice but he took over in 1923 when Lupton left the workshop. Edward and his wife moved to the house next to the workshop in Cockshott Lane, Froxfield,in 1925,and they still live in the same house today. Edward and his wife both went to Bedales School and so did both of their children. Their Son,Jon,is a London based architect,who has been closely involved in the building development at Bedales School.He designed the brand new buildings at Dunhurst School.Edward doesn't work in the workshop any more.The last time he made anything was 10 years ago in 1975.He still owns the workshop and he hires craftsmen and apprentices to work there.He is 85 now and spends most of his life indoors by the fire.
